text.section:
There is a program of scholarships for children of volunteer fire fighters or volunteer ambulance or rescue squad members who died or were disabled by an accident resulting from:
Performing any duties necessary to the operation or maintenance of the fire company; or
Actively participating in the ambulance or rescue squad work of an incorporated volunteer fire company or volunteer ambulance or rescue squad in the State.
The recipient of a scholarship under this section shall be a graduate of an accredited high school.

The Board of Trustees of the Maryland State Firemen's Association, in its discretion, shall:
Determine the amount of each award; and
Select the recipient of each award.
The Maryland State Firemen's Association shall provide the funds for these awards.
